column4: hey this is not ubuntu related but more related to the chromium webbrowser but how do enable local cahcing of data
does it by default no setup required
just add --proxy-server=127.0.0.1:8123 to the app line
polipo will cache websites to disk
either on the desktop app shortcut. or add that to /etc/chromium/default
ok a lil box popped up after i put that in the terminal
in the top is say default (/ect/chromium) getit
sure you didnt make a type?
do it in terminal using tabs to complete. its more reliable
